courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Master frontend and backend development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

courses.title: Data Analysis with Python
courses.description: Learn to analyze and visualize data using Python, Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

courses.title: Machine Learning & AI
courses.description: Build intelligent systems with supervised and unsupervised learning using Python and scikit-learn.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Get hands-on with AWS services like EC2, S3, Lambda, and deploy cloud-native applications.

courses.title: Cyber Security Essentials
courses.description: Understand threats, vulnerabilities, and protection mechanisms in the digital world.

courses.title: DevOps & CI/CD
courses.description: Learn DevOps practices and tools like Docker, Jenkins, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions.

courses.title: Frontend Development with React
courses.description: Build dynamic UIs with React, hooks, context API, and component-driven architecture.

courses.title: Backend Development with Node.js
courses.description: Create robust APIs using Node.js, Express, and integrate with MongoDB.

courses.title: SQL & Database Management
courses.description: Master relational databases with SQL queries, normalization, indexing, and joins.

courses.title: Career Readiness & Interview Prep
courses.description: Enhance your soft skills, resume, and prepare for tech interviews with mock sessions.
